section.title: Wavetable view
section.para: You can use the wavetable view to load, export and edit samples. You can also edit the envelopes that are used by Matilde Tracker and can be used by any other machine when the author thinks that is convenient.

section.title: Wave Editor
section.para: After the sample is loaded you can navigade the wave editor view with the mouse. Use the middle mouse button to zoom in and out. Note the indicator at the buttom indicating the section of the wave that is currently displayed. Press the right mouse button and sroll around to move around in the waveform. You can use the left mouse button to make selections. Start a selection by clicking with the left mouse button and dragging. If you want to adjust the selection just click with the left button on either left or right side of the selection and drag. You can apply certain actions to selections. Those are explained bellow along other commands that operate with the waves and that can be launched with the buttons at the bottom of the wave editor.
